    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(Tennis game)
        Change the x direction of the ball if it hits a paddle or the side walls. Change the y direction of the ball if it hits the floor or ceiling
        Parameters:
        game - Main driver Tennis instance

      • paddleCollide

        private void paddleCollide(Tennis game)
        Detects if a collision occurs between the ball and the player paddle. Each collision increases intersectionHits by three due to rendering of collision happening multiple times. Therefore, if intersectionHits modulo 3 == 0, a single collision occurred and player score is increased by one
        Parameters:
        game - Main driver Tennis instance

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Used strictly to display the player paddle graphic.
        Parameters:
        graphics - Main driver graphics instance
